DataFrame.DestinationPANIdentifier: uint16 (optional, present if Destination Addressing Mode is nonzero)
DataFrame.DestinationAddress: uint16 | uint64 (optional, present if Destination Addressing Mode is nonzero)
DataFrame.SourcePANIdentifier: uint16 (optional, present if Source Addressing Mode is nonzero and Intra-PAN is 0)
DataFrame.SourceAddress: uint16 | uint64 (optional, present if Source Addressing Mode is nonzero)
